vocabulary.example: The bomb was undetected by security until it was almost too late.
The Secret Service undergoes rigorous training to protect the president.

vocabulary.definition: an action taken to counteract a danger or threat
vocabulary.example: The electronic countermeasure vehicle protected the president from potential attacks.

vocabulary.definition: susceptible to physical or emotional harm
vocabulary.example: The modifications to the limousine made the president more visible but also more vulnerable.

vocabulary.definition: completely sealed, especially against the escape or entry of air
vocabulary.example: The interior of the armored vehicle is hermetically sealed to protect against chemical attacks.

vocabulary.definition: the action of reducing the severity, seriousness, or painfulness of something
vocabulary.example: The hazardous materials mitigation unit is equipped to respond to various types of attacks.
